sourcesContent:
import react, { useState } from 'react' import axios from 'axios' import {Form,Button} from 'react-bootstrap' function AddForm (){ const [data, setData] = useState({ title : "", year : "", runtime: "", genres: "", actors: "", plot:"", director:"", posterUrl : "", }) function submit(e){ e.preventDefault(); axios.post(' http://localhost:3005/posts',data) .then(res => { console.log(res.data) }) } function handle(e){ const newdata = { ...data } newdata[e.target.id] = e.target.value setData (newdata) console.log(newdata) } return( <>
submit(e)}> handle(e)} value={data.title} type="text" id="title" placeholder="title" />

handle(e)} value={data.year} type="text" id="year" placeholder="year" />

handle(e)} value={data.runtime} type="text" id="runtime" placeholder="runtime" />

handle(e)} value={data.genres} type="text" id="genres" placeholder="genres" />

handle(e)} value={data.director} type="text" id="director" placeholder="director" />

handle(e)} value={data.actors} type="text" id="actors" placeholder="actors" />

handle(e)} value={data.actors} type="text" id="plot" placeholder="plot" /> handle(e)} value={data.posterUrl} type="text" id="posterUrl" placeholder="posterUrl" />
) } export default AddForm
